systemSpecs.technicalDetails:
Fortnite requires an internet connection and supports the following devices: 
- iPhone 11 or later with 4GB RAM
- iPad Pro 13” (1st gen or later)
- iPad Pro 11” (3rd gen or later)
- iPad Air (4th gen or later)
- iPad Mini (6th gen or later)
- iPad (10th gen or later)
Rocket League Sideswipe requires minimum iOS 12 or higher, 64 bit, and 2GB of RAM

Fall Guys requires an internet connection and supports the following devices: 
- iPhone 11 or later with 4GB RAM
- iPad Pro 13” (1st gen or later)
- iPad Pro 11” (3rd gen or later)
- iPad Air (4th gen or later)
- iPad Mini (6th gen or later)
- iPad (10th gen or later)

* iOS 17.6 or higher
* 4 GB RAM
* Internet connection
* Login Accounts Required - Epic Games
